SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Attacks
The Attacks class is used to create an attack object.
Combat
The Combat class is where the player fights against enemies.
Enemy
The Enemy class represents an enemy with a name, health, and an attack.
Formatting
The Formatting class is used to enhance readability through the use of colors in the text.
Items
The Items class is used to create an item object.
Main
 
Navigation
The Navigation class handles the player's location throughout the game map in a 5x5 grid system.
Player
The Player class represents the main character controlled by the user.
Weapon
The Weapon class is used to create a weapon object.
